Detailed Description

Context associated with a renderer.

◆ namespaceName()

const char* rev::RenderContext::namespaceName ( ) const
inlineoverridevirtual

The full namespace for this class.

Every subclass should redefine/override this property to return its full namespace. The built in logging methods will use this value for the message category

Reimplemented from rev::Object.

Member Data Documentation

◆ m_boundBuffers

std::vector<Uuid> rev::RenderContext::m_boundBuffers
protected

Currently bound buffer IDs, can currently be an SSB.

Are indexed by their buffer target type, e.g. UBO, SSB, etc.
